LanguageData.Bullet_EMTurretGoop.label: acidic goop
LanguageData.EMTurretGoop.label: acid launcher
LanguageData.EMTurretGoop.description: A turret possessed of basic intelligence through manipulation of mechanites. Fires streams of acidic material, on contact with this acidic material the target is slowed. This is unsurprisingly very painful for them. Has a minimum range.
LanguageData.Gun_EMTurretGoop.label: acid launcher
LanguageData.Gun_EMTurretGoop.description: Jury-rigged gun attached to a turret.
LanguageData.Gun_EMTurretGoop.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: acid launcher
